Hello Low End Users !!

HostingInside constantly spread out promotion on others forum and this is the first time on Low End(actually the second, first one break the rules :D)

It is 20% off lifetime with some features described below:
1. Raid 10
2. Daily Backup
3. Offsite Backup
4. 100mbps connection
5. IRC Allowed, but limited to ircd. Please contact us if you plan to link it with big network.
6. Shoutcast Allowed
7. Game Server Allowed
8. Proxy/VPN Allowed


Package name called **x256**
CPU: 1 CPU(Fair Share)
HD: 10GB
MEM: 256MB
SWAP: 128MB
Traffic: 250GB/month
1 IPv4
Normal Price: $8.75USD per month
Promo Price: Just $7USD (life time price)
[Click here to order](https://www.hostinginside.com/billing/cart.php)
Please use coupon code "XEN2012" to have discount applied.

Click [here](http://www.hostinginside.com/serverstatus/) to understand our server status.


Webmin: free
directAdmin: $5.99 USD/month
cPanel: $12.99 USD/month
Webuzo: $2.5 USD/month

Payment Method: PayPal (We DO NOT accept unverified PayPal Account.)
Refund policies: 3 days money back guarantee and partial refund after 3 days.

XEN UK Server location: London, UK(Test IP: 78.110.173.194)
